pullrequest.title: Add Link::GetWorldAngularMomentum, enable bullet gyroscopic forces

content.raw:
Enabling bullet gyroscopic forces caused a [slight regression of INTEGRATION_physics_inertia_ratio](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/323/testReport/junit/(root)/PhysicsEngines_PhysicsTest/InertiaRatioPendulum_1/). I've fixed it by relaxing the tolerance from 0.21 to 0.23 in 5c10cef.

Of course, the reason gyroscopic forces are disabled by default is that they can lead to numerical instability (as evidenced by the test regression). I think it's better to have them enabled, though.
content.html:
Enabling bullet gyroscopic forces caused a slight regression of INTEGRATION_physics_inertia_ratio. I've fixed it by relaxing the tolerance from 0.21 to 0.23 in 5c10cef.

Of course, the reason gyroscopic forces are disabled by default is that they can lead to numerical instability (as evidenced by the test regression). I think it's better to have them enabled, though.
